title: My Grocery List - Shop & ToDo
summary: Make your everyday shopping easier with My Grocery
description: My Grocery is a simple and easy to use app that makes products buying a snap. Spend less time while shopping, save money and keep track of your to-do items on the go or while at home.- Fill your shopping list with just a few taps- Get smart suggestions when adding items- Manage lists and products easily- Adjust list sizes for easy use on the go- Export your lists via SMS, E-Mail and more- Cooperate with friends & family to complete your lists- Create and manage an unlimited number of lists- Import lists from any text editorGet in touch with us and follow the latest news:https://www.facebook.com/macropinchhttps://twitter.com/macropinch
descriptionHTML:
My Grocery is a simple and easy to use app that makes products buying a snap. Spend less time while shopping, save money and keep track of your to-do items on the go or while at home.

- Fill your shopping list with just a few taps
- Get smart suggestions when adding items
- Manage lists and products easily
- Adjust list sizes for easy use on the go
- Export your lists via SMS, E-Mail and more
- Cooperate with friends & family to complete your lists
- Create and manage an unlimited number of lists
- Import lists from any text editor


Get in touch with us and follow the latest news:
https://www.facebook.com/macropinch
https://twitter.com/macropinch
comments: Works great! The only things I would change is 1, make the quantity keyboard use numbers for easier entry and 2, show the number of an items overall (included on all lists) so if I have two lists that contain eggs, it would show the overall count I need. Other than that it makes keeping shopping lists a breeze.

Use it all the time This works for me and I use it to prepare my shopping lists. That green tick that shows when I have finished and all items are accounted for I give to you - consider it my tick of approval.
Handy Dandy, I like the fact that I can start my list and get it on my watch and stays on while I shop. Better than getting my phone out. Thanks!
Love. Would be nice if marked items auto move to bottom of list
Supper It gives you an insight.
recentChanges: Bug fixes and Android Wear fixes
